name: Oracle
description:
“Oracle” is a tribute to @Dambass
tw:@soydambass
 

Phenakistoscope n°11 “Oracle”
Gif : 1500 x 1500 pxls

This is a still image spining, the rest is in your head.

The phenakistiscope, or phenakistoscope was the first widespread animation device that created a fluent illusion of motion. The phenakistiscope is regarded as one of the first forms of moving media entertainment that paved the way for the future motion picture and film industry. Like a GIF animation, it can only show a short continuous loop.

Fisical, functional version also available.
